verses.verse: And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> <WH413> all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Hear, <WH8085> O Israel, <WH3478> <WH853> the statutes <WH2706> and judgments <WH4941> which <WH834> I <WH595> speak <WH1696> in your ears <WH241> this day, <WH3117> that ye may learn <WH3925> them, and keep, <WH8104> and do <WH6213> them.
The LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with <WH5973> us in Horeb. <WH2722>

The LORD <WH3068> made <WH3772> not <WH3808> <WH853> this <WH2063> covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> our fathers, <WH1> but <WH3588> with <WH854> us, even us, <WH587> who <WH428> are all <WH3605> of us here <WH6311> alive <WH2416> this day. <WH3117>
The LORD <WH3068> talked <WH1696> with <WH5973> you face to face <WH6440> <WH6440> in the mount <WH2022> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of the fire, <WH784>

(I <WH595> stood <WH5975> between <WH996> the LORD <WH3068> and you at that <WH1931> time, <WH6256> to show <WH5046> you <WH853> the word <WH1697> of the LORD: <WH3068> for <WH3588> ye were afraid <WH3372> by reason of <WH4480> <WH6440> the fire, <WH784> and went not up <WH5927> <WH3808> into the mount;) <WH2022> saying, <WH559>
I <WH595> am the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> which <WH834> brought <WH3318> thee out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of bondage. <WH5650>
Thou shalt have <WH1961> none <WH3808> other <WH312> gods <WH430> before <WH5921> <WH6440> me.

Thou shalt not <WH3808> make <WH6213> thee any graven image, <WH6459> or any <WH3605> likeness <WH8544> of any thing that <WH834> is in heaven <WH8064> above, <WH4480> <WH4605> or that <WH834> is in the earth <WH776> beneath, <WH4480> <WH8478> or that <WH834> is in the waters <WH4325> beneath <WH4480> <WH8478> the earth: <WH776>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> bow down thyself <WH7812> unto them, nor <WH3808> serve <WH5647> them: for <WH3588> I <WH595> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> am a jealous <WH7067> God, <WH410> visiting <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon <WH5921> the children <WH1121> unto <WH5921> the third <WH8029> and fourth <WH7256> generation of them that hate <WH8130> me,
And showing <WH6213> mercy <WH2617> unto thousands <WH505> of them that love <WH157> me and keep <WH8104> my commandments. <WH4687>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> take <WH5375> <WH853> the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> in vain: <WH7723> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> will not <WH3808> hold him guiltless <WH5352> <WH853> that <WH834> taketh <WH5375> <WH853> his name <WH8034> in vain. <WH7723>
Keep <WH8104> <WH853> the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> to sanctify <WH6942> it, as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> thee.
Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> thou shalt labor, <WH5647> and do <WH6213> all <WH3605> thy work: <WH4399>

But the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is the sabbath <WH7676> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God: <WH430> in it thou shalt not <WH3808> do <WH6213> any <WH3605> work, <WH4399> thou, <WH859> nor thy son, <WH1121> nor thy daughter, <WH1323> nor thy manservant, <WH5650> nor thy maidservant, <WH519> nor thine ox, <WH7794> nor thine ass, <WH2543> nor any <WH3605> of thy cattle, <WH929> nor thy stranger <WH1616> that <WH834> is within thy gates; <WH8179> that <WH4616> thy manservant <WH5650> and thy maidservant <WH519> may rest <WH5117> as well as thou.

And remember <WH2142> that <WH3588> thou wast <WH1961> a servant <WH5650> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and that the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> brought thee out <WH3318> thence <WH4480> <WH8033> through a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027> and by a stretched out <WH5186> arm: <WH2220> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> thee to keep <WH6213> <WH853> the sabbath <WH7676> day. <WH3117>

Honor <WH3513> <WH853> thy father <WH1> and thy mother, <WH517> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> thee; that <WH4616> thy days <WH3117> may be prolonged, <WH748> and that <WH4616> it may go well <WH3190> with thee, in <WH5921> the land <WH127> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee.
Thou shalt not <WH3808> kill. <WH7523>
Neither <WH3808> shalt thou commit adultery. <WH5003>
Neither <WH3808> shalt thou steal. <WH1589>
Neither <WH3808> shalt thou bear <WH6030> false <WH7723> witness <WH5707> against thy neighbor. <WH7453>

Neither <WH3808> shalt thou desire <WH2530> thy neighbor's <WH7453> wife, <WH802> neither <WH3808> shalt thou covet <WH183> thy neighbor's <WH7453> house, <WH1004> his field, <WH7704> or his manservant, <WH5650> or his maidservant, <WH519> his ox, <WH7794> or his ass, <WH2543> or any <WH3605> thing that <WH834> is thy neighbor's. <WH7453>

<WH853> These <WH428> words <WH1697> the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> all <WH3605> your assembly <WH6951> in the mount <WH2022> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of the fire, <WH784> of the cloud, <WH6051> and of the thick darkness, <WH6205> with a great <WH1419> voice: <WH6963> and he added no more. <WH3254> <WH3808> And he wrote <WH3789> them in <WH5921> two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> and delivered <WH5414> them unto <WH413> me.

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when ye heard <WH8085> <WH853> the voice <WH6963> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of the darkness, <WH2822> (for the mountain <WH2022> did burn <WH1197> with fire,) <WH784> that ye came near <WH7126> unto <WH413> me, even all <WH3605> the heads <WH7218> of your tribes, <WH7626> and your elders; <WH2205>

And ye said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2005> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> hath showed <WH7200> us <WH853> his glory <WH3519> and his greatness, <WH1433> and we have heard <WH8085> his voice <WH6963> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of the fire: <WH784> we have seen <WH7200> this <WH2088> day <WH3117> that <WH3588> God <WH430> doth talk <WH1696> with <WH854> man, <WH120> and he liveth. <WH2425>

Now <WH6258> therefore why <WH4100> should we die? <WH4191> for <WH3588> this <WH2063> great <WH1419> fire <WH784> will consume <WH398> us: if <WH518> we <WH587> hear <WH8085> <WH853> the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> any more, <WH3254> <WH5750> then we shall die. <WH4191>

For <WH3588> who <WH4310> is there of all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> that <WH834> hath heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the living <WH2416> God <WH430> speaking <WH1696> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of the fire, <WH784> as we <WH3644> have, and lived? <WH2421>

Go thou near, <WH7126> <WH859> and hear <WH8085> <WH853> all <WH3605> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> shall say: <WH559> and speak <WH1696> thou <WH859> unto <WH413> us <WH853> all <WH3605> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> shall speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> thee; and we will hear <WH8085> it, and do <WH6213> it.

And the LORD <WH3068> heard <WH8085> <WH853> the voice <WH6963> of your words, <WH1697> when ye spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> me; and the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, I have heard <WH8085> <WH853> the voice <WH6963> of the words <WH1697> of this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> which <WH834> they have spoken <WH1696> unto <WH413> thee: they have well said <WH3190> all <WH3605> that <WH834> they have spoken. <WH1696>

O that <WH4310> <WH5414> there were <WH1961> such <WH2088> a heart <WH3824> in them, that they would fear <WH3372> me, and keep <WH8104> <WH853> all <WH3605> my commandments <WH4687> always, <WH3605> <WH3117> that <WH4616> it might be well <WH3190> with them, and with their children <WH1121> forever! <WH5769>
Go <WH1980> say <WH559> to them, Get <WH7725> you into your tents <WH168> again.

But as for thee, <WH859> stand <WH5975> thou here <WH6311> by <WH5978> me, and I will speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> thee <WH853> all <WH3605> the commandments, <WH4687> and the statutes, <WH2706> and the judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> thou shalt teach <WH3925> them, that they may do <WH6213> them in the land <WH776> which <WH834> I <WH595> give <WH5414> them to possess <WH3423> it.

Ye shall observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> therefore as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> you: ye shall not <WH3808> turn aside <WH5493> to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left. <WH8040>

Ye shall walk <WH1980> in all <WH3605> the ways <WH1870> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> you, that <WH4616> ye may live, <WH2421> and that it may be well <WH2895> with you, and that ye may prolong <WH748> your days <WH3117> in the land <WH776> which <WH834> ye shall possess. <WH3423>
